articles.author: Chloe Cornish
articles.title: China's Ant Group swaps stake in India's Paytm for debt - Financial Times
articles.description: Geopolitical tensions simmer as New Delhi cracks down on Chinese companies in the country
articles.content:
Jack Ma-founded Ant Group will swap nearly half its equity stake in Indian payments company Paytm for convertible debt, as geopolitical tension lingers between India and China. 
The 10.3 per cent st… [+3038 chars]

articles.author: Suban Abdulla
articles.title: UK hiring falls at fastest pace in over three years, wage growth slows - Reuters UK
articles.description: British employers reduced the number of new permanent staff they hired through recruitment agencies by the most since mid 2020 last month due to concerns about the economic outlook, adding to signs that the market is becoming tougher for job seekers.
